translated_text: Going a step further, loving your partner is your own freedom. You can choose to be in a relationship or be single. It has nothing to do with gender or country. You are free to fall in love with a boy or a girl or from which country you want to fall in love with. Don't be swayed by some narrow views on marriage and love. If the current society cannot tolerate your love, you should be brave enough to improve yourself and change society's views. Don't just sit back and wait for death, accept the consequences and give up on yourself! , you must love yourself first. Donâ€™t engage in any romantic plots about sacrificing yourself for love. Itâ€™s unrealistic. Only by loving yourself first can you have the right to love others. I donâ€™t want to accept the heavy burden of your love for yourself. , objectifying women is a minefield for me. I feel that I belong to myself first. If I want to delve deeper into who I belong to, this is not a question that I can explore with my current experience. So I think everyone has their own ideas. Donâ€™t have too extreme views. Donâ€™t generalize and just focus on small parts. If you want to smear a large area, there is no problem with this. In addition, you can go to bed earlier next time. Staying up late is not good for your health. ,thank you for your reply . It is true that most people will bring the benefits to themselves. Therefore, once the interests are no longer balanced, there will definitely be quarrels. But I think first of all, people will tend to benefit themselves, so they will definitely feel that this is unfair and that is unfair, and they cry out for rights and respect every day. Secondly, more problems can be reflected in these frictions. If there is just no communication and no one to express their dissatisfaction, then the problem will become bigger and bigger. It is also a bit far-fetched and boys, including everyone, should respect most people. people. Not only Chinese women, but also some marginalized figures in society, the elderly, homeless people, the disabled, and the LGBT community. These people are not treated with the same respect. This is something I should reflect on, and how important it is not to objectify women. Women are not who you say has bigger breasts or longer legs. Do you prefer those with bigger breasts or longer legs? She is a complete individual just like you. Don't pick and choose like items. , that I believe in the country does not mean that I believe in the citizens of the country. I hope everyone loves themselves, no matter who they are, male or female. No matter who you love, you should love yourself first.

translated_text: Sorry, I didnâ€™t refresh the webpage when replying, and I exceeded the word limit, so I have to post it in two paragraphs. I didnâ€™t see your addition until I finished replying. I apologize for the misunderstanding. As for my feeling that my mother has said abusive words, let me say it again. Itâ€™s not my feeling, but the societyâ€™s feeling. As a member of society, I have to look at issues from a societyâ€™s perspective instead of deceiving myself. , I think mother should not be used as a derogatory term, and I point out that it is wrong to use mother as a derogatory term. Is this society devaluing "mother" because misogyny means misogyny? My mother (adjective), I am particularly motherly because I am a woman and my mother is also a woman. I act like a pussy because I am a pussy. I love women (non-sexual), and woman is not a derogatory term in my eyes. OK, thank you, I am "misogynistic". ,? ? ? First of all, this society is misogynistic, and "mother" as a derogatory term is a manifestation of misogyny. For example, slut shaming is misogynistic, and "female driver" stigmatization is also misogynistic, etc. "To say your mother is misogynistic is misogynistic in itself." Who is misogynistic? Did I give the word "mother" a derogatory meaning? Otherwise, why do you think I wrote such a long paragraph, just to see the diversity of your species? , "These words should not be allowed to have derogatory connotations" Is a double negative equal to an affirmation, okay? Study Chinese well, really. , â€œwithout the derogatory connotationâ€? ? Please take a closer look at your original words to see if there is a problem with my reading comprehension or with your ability to express yourself. My use of "cheap" only strengthens my point of view and refutes your original article. No one wants to be described in a derogatory way. , Sensitivity is a good thing, if people who are not sensitive raise questions, they will end up being boiled frogs in warm water. And where does this go? It's just to fight for a "mother" not to be derogatory, and not to use mother as a means of insulting others, and to be said to be overkill. Then I can only wish you a happy life, don't enjoy the life that women's rights have won, and feel free to be humiliated by your own gender. , just like "cheap", a derogatory term. According to your meaning: you have to accept the word, you have to think it is nothing. But let me ask you, are you willing to be described as "cheap"? No one wants to choose to be described in a derogatory way. In the same way, if "mother" is still a derogatory term, it is impossible for anyone to voluntarily choose to be described by it, and it is impossible for them to feel that it is okay. This is why we need to get rid of the derogatory nature of "mother" first, instead of contradicting ourselves like you do. There is nothing wrong with the word "mother" in itself, but in a patriarchal context, people give it a derogatory connotation and make it a means of insulting people. translated_text: Yes, you only went to the 9th grade of compulsory education, which is really pitiful. No wonder you can't speak fluently. It's really pitiful. Mr. Ning is a talent. His words are illogical and he can't win an argument. I suggest you read more books. Don't fantasize about women every day. Your mother will be angry if she knows you fantasize like this. You don't dare to criticize rural feminism, but you dare to argue with me here. You are really great. On the three obediences and four virtues of women, the social status of Japanese women at home is not good. Don't you know that? Why don't you say that you are embarrassed to admit that you are a man? You also talk about Chinese traditions. You really make me laugh to death. Look at the current textbooks. Do they say that women should follow the three obediences and four virtues? Does the country promote the three obediences and four virtues for women? Is it reflected in the core socialist values? Don't bring up culture. Don't you know that the inheritance of excellent culture is to take its essence and discard its dross? Oh, why don't you have any impression of other excellent cultures, but the three obediences and four virtues are so deep in your impression? A man is not you, aren't you a man? Why do you still need to find one? ,I represent rural feminism? Are you suffering from paranoia? You still want to follow the Three Obediences and Four Virtues? Do you think you live in the Qing Dynasty? Are you a zombie from the Qing Dynasty? If you want the Three Obediences and Four Virtues, why don't you just find a Japanese woman? They will be very obedient to you. Oh my, how many times have you men done housework for free? How many times have you taken care of children? Do you think you are too awesome after doing housework and taking care of children? ? So we women have to go out to work and earn money and go home to take care of children and do housework. Do you think that you can just contribute sperm and leave it alone after getting married? Then why don't you just marry a nanny? What are you talking about?

translated_text: Don't come here to make a rake. I said that my parents gave birth to me, and I gave birth to my daughter out of love. Capitalists pay attention to efficiency. Men's wages are higher, but the value they create is also higher. Compared to boys, girls are less valuable for exploitation, have other physical limitations, and are guided by public opinion.

A truly just movement will not persecute any innocent person, but the initiator has fundamentally deviated from the essence of the movement. I am not against women fighting for their legitimate rights. What I am against is that some women with bad intentions bully unrelated people in the name of women's rights.

Animals eat animals to survive. That is not exploitation, it is the natural food chain. Male dominance is anti-nature.

translated_text: I not only want to veto their so-called propositions, but even despise them. If Ma Rongâ€™s misappropriation of Wang Baoqiangâ€™s property caused netizens to demand legislation to protect menâ€™s marital property, some women would stand up and say: If you are like this, how will I get along with boys when I talk about marriage in the future? I will be misunderstood. What should I do if I worship money? Only with the most basic sympathy and empathy can you call others and have the right to discuss your own demands. , you hit the point. These men's demands for such untimely self-assertion are based on their disregard for women's rights. Therefore, their claims are not reasonable at all. The groups closely related to them have been violated and harmed for a long time. They just don't say a word, and they even worry about whether they can have sex smoothly if the problem gets bigger. This is what these people are meant to do and that is why it is disgusting. , Courtship has never belonged to women. Thank you, this word has never been a feminine word. If I donâ€™t go into too much detail now, I find it particularly strange. The current discussion is obviously focused on how to prevent women from being victimized in power, and why men are paying unprecedented attention to their rights to flirt/courtship. It's as if the school is reporting on a teacher's gimmickry, and suddenly a teacher stands up and says, "Oh, you have gone too far. How can I care for my classmates in the future?" , I simply ask, when women have been treated as objects, stared at, played with, and harmed by power for a long time, almost no men have stood up. Now that the metoo movement has just begun, some men have begun to worry about themselves and others without mentioning solidarity. Menâ€™s right to flirt, is this really a human thing? , I would like to ask when did the word flirting become mainstream for women in the context of male-dominated society. , arenâ€™t those who question meToo just trying to plead guilty to menâ€™s flirting? ? The word "flirt" itself is full of patriarchal connotations. If you ask me, men should not flirt. They are not unmarried and infertile, but they must marry and have children. However, they treat women as slaves. They talk about not having sex for three days. How can you not lose ten years for three years? Making money every year makes me feel that my life is not safe. Extreme feminism only cares about themselves, while extreme patriarchy wants slaves. The difference is clearly visible.
Yes, I also have a very strong female filter. If the other person is a woman, I will be soft-hearted. Once I determine that the gender is a man, I will immediately start to scold.
As long as you speak up for women, as long as you have a sense of independence, you are a "female fighter"
Why don't we raise the standards for male actors but restrict the standards for actresses...can't we open it up together?

But why don't you look too ugly when you rush up to a poor loser? I don't do anything that's only good for me. Have you graduated from elementary school? Did I help the girls who scolded them? I've been talking about how you charge at other people's posters throughout this article. You have to hit the target with your gun.

translated_text: Iâ€™m really tired of it. Western spiritual colonization doesnâ€™t matter anymore. The worst thing we can do is colonize. Our aesthetics are getting closer and closer to white people. I have never seen the perfume ads on the streets and subways with Chinese people. There are all kinds of luxurious scenes on TV with white people in them. The bloody capital of the West is primitive. Accumulation has created "developed countries", it's really boring. Just look at the 13-year-old companion next to you and smile. What would they be like? Later I came into contact with the Feminist Joke Club and I joined the group chat. Until now, I just feel that these are ridiculous, ridiculous comedies. Xiu Xi develops "genetic weapons" to exterminate men, civet cell phone cases. There is a "struggle of interests" over mobile phone cases in the Little Crocodile Maomao Company. Itâ€™s really annoying. To promote that menstruation is not shameful is to use drawings of menstruation as a drink, or even distribute it directly. What if it was a nocturnal emission? They wanted to accuse me when I compared women's boxing to women's rights in the Vigil House. Now no one comes out to play word games. Why, because this wave of lumberjack groups has finished. There are only feudal ideas in the country, and there are no men's boxing or men's rights. It was always just a boring civet who wanted to use various murder cases on Weibo to prove that the Chinese civet is an inferior species.

Brother Kai Shui is only a little bit straight when he comments on women's appearance, but otherwise he can be called a friend of women. In addition, there are particularly many cancers among straight men among gay men, and some are much more exaggerated than those among straight men.

translated_text: Just tell me which person in the public welfare circle, public intellectual circle, and cultural circle who has been reported has been wrongly accused? which one? Which of the women who reported their real names is a feminist bitch? , People who have never been harassed can stand and talk without pain in their backs. Do you think it is a proud thing to be touched on the legs by a greasy old man who is decades old and has a family? Is it worth it for women to rush out to claim the award? , In fact, there are also boys who are harassed and sexually assaulted, but the proportion is relatively small. When the proportion is large, you will not be like this, because it threatens you or your relatives and friends. Why do people like you or Yan Lieshan jump out? They just feel that they can no longer "touch legs" openly in the circle. They feel that their own interests are threatened, so they can't wait to jump out and fight for it. , one hundred million of your net worth was stolen, and the thief should also be punished. If you are not rich, you are guilty. Similarly, just because I attend a party does not mean that I will have my thigh touched by default. If I am harassed, I am being harassed. It is only shameful to slut-sham the victim. , how to call a feminist bitch? Do you think what Iâ€™m telling you now is a feminist bitch? , I mentioned calling the police because there was a post on your Weibo that said, "Why don't you call the police if this is really the case? What you say on Weibo is the same as calling the police. I will tell you that calling the police is sometimes useless, and you are This is talking about rights and feminism. Then you see itâ€™s useless to call the police. If you post on Weibo and you get scolded, what do you think the victim should do? Bear it? Can you come up with a plan? Kidnappers who kidnap family members may not necessarily call the police immediately. You may not be scolded back in time if you are scolded by others. Whether you call the police immediately or not is not a defense for scum, nor is it An excuse to scold the real-name whistleblower. Are all the articles and articles by many women reporting against him just to falsely accuse him? Yan Lieshan is an ugly person, has a tough mouth, and his words are inconsistent and his thinking is confusing. , whether to call the police in time is not a reason for people like you to defend people who have been proven to be scum. ,ğŸ· Where is the army? The girl also called the police. Was it helpful? Does sexual harassment not count? Jiang Fangzhou falsely accused Zhang Wen? , Yan Lieshan speaks for Zhang Wen and scolds the victim, and you speak for Yan Lieshan, there is no difference between the two of you. You may both think that touching the thigh is sexual harassment, right?

translated_text: According to the empathy rape of the grasshopper, it proves that they are usually on the same level as one, but after sucking the dick, they will be on the same level as the two.

Did you hear it? The men themselves have said it. If women want to be treated as equals, they can no longer create sons and fathers. Anyone who gives birth to sons to men is a female sinner and a traitor.

As I said before, it is true that Kochi is worthy of Kochi, but some Kochi men want women who not only run the family, but are unwilling to take care of the family themselves. Isn't this a contradiction? , the reason why it is brought up for discussion is because most non-Kochis directly choose the stronger one when it comes to choosing a spouse. Their range of choices is wider, and then they default to the traditional marriage model where the male leads the outside and the female leads. There are actually not many conflicts. In comparison, Kochi does. A little special. Men and women who donâ€™t know how much they weigh are not included in the discussion. The premise for a woman to enter into marriage must be that her material resources are better than before, at least not as good as before. Even if her husband helps her take care of the house, she will not be worse than before. If it is worse than before, should we eat love as bread? ,No matter how the times change, the premise that spirit is just an add-on to matter will not change. , Letâ€™s put it this way, in primitive society, a female alone cannot raise a child, or she can raise a child that is sallow and skinny. With a male who is stronger than her, she can raise a child that is fair and fat. In modern society, a highly educated woman can raise her children well on her own, and with a better husband than her, she can raise her children better, go to a prestigious school, and study abroad. Is this a contradiction? , and those born after 1995 and 2000 have not yet married and started a family, and have not yet reached the level of Kochi. Sometimes it is not that they have accepted it, but that they have not encountered this problem yet, and their position may change by then. , you are right, there are indeed many families that have done a good job. However, there are many people who do not do well when conflicts occur, and there are many people who are highly educated but stubborn. Therefore, I say that the social conflicts caused by this are worthy of consideration and attention. Everyoneâ€™s thinking must slowly change. My feeling is that the people born in the 1995s and 00s are more accepting of this now, but the people born in the 90s and 80s are still not. They are still more repulsive because high-skilled women have less family responsibilities than before. ,The current contradiction is that a high-minded woman herself is very strong in the workplace. Either she can find a spouse who is better than her in the workplace, and thus accepts the traditional marriage model, and her choice space becomes narrower. Either her husband is not as good as her, but he can take care of the family more, at least as much as she does. However, due to traditional thinking, many men are not willing to do this. It may be extreme to say that marriage is meaningless, but it would be inappropriate to ask highly educated women about both traditional marriage and co-working of men and women in the workplace. This is also the reason why many highly educated women are opposed to traditional marriage. Generally speaking, if a woman has a strong earning capacity, and if she is the same as a man, she should be equally responsible for housework as her husband. If she is stronger than a man, the man will take on more family responsibilities. , Traditional marriage is balanced. Men bear heavier responsibilities in the workplace (men are stronger and women are weaker), and women bear heavier responsibilities at home (men are weaker and women are stronger). If a woman neither makes money nor takes care of the family, her family will not be established, so men do not suffer. But for high-minded women, if you ask her to bear heavier responsibilities in the family and at the same time bear the same responsibilities as boys in society, it will definitely be unbalanced. The reason why primitive societies have marriage is because it is difficult for females to Raising offspring alone would be a low productivity nowadays. As for warmth and love, they are all additional meanings, not the main contradiction. You see, this blogger has mentioned so much and explained so much, but has he mentioned feelings? Be clear about priorities.

translated_text: I am not opposed to you scolding married women. If scolding married women can make unmarried women stay unmarried, that would be great, but maliciously spreading hatred and targeting married women is too much. After all, the main culprits of oppression of women are men. Donâ€™t confuse who the main contradiction is with the class enemy. If scolding married women can overthrow male supremacy, I absolutely support your scolding. Really, can scolding a married woman relieve the oppression of male power on you? Can scolding married women overturn male supremacy? You are different from me. I am working and you are not working? We all work the same and contribute the same to society. They are all taxpayers, what you think is different. , within the framework of a patriarchal society, every woman among us is making a contribution to male dominance. Otherwise, how can you explain that only 2% of the wealth is in the hands of women? I am a working woman who has worked diligently for more than 20 years. Apart from being married, what is the difference between me and you? Why do you think that by scolding me you can relieve the oppression of male power on you? , what is your purpose of scolding the married woman? Is the purpose of scolding married women just to scold married women? Or do you really believe that you can overturn male supremacy by scolding married women? , why kill with one hand? Can't the genetic virus be destroyed? Science and technology are the primary productive forces. Itâ€™s funny that you still want to take advantage of others when they are all alone. , you are anti-male if you donâ€™t give birth to a boy, and I am not anti-male if I donâ€™t give birth to a boy. Got it, youâ€™re absolutely right. You just donâ€™t believe that an all-female society will be realized. To oppose men, you only need to curse married women. So your way to fight against patriarchy is to curse married women. Okay, you can vent. I have thought about it for a long time. It is impossible to eliminate slave owners by scolding slaves to kill slaves. For a group that only holds 2% of the world's wealth, the only way to become masters is to kill slave owners. This is the only way. This road may be difficult, but it is the only right way. It is also the only way to achieve it. Revolution is not a dinner party. If you want to evolve peacefully, just eat your shit. , I will never have a son, I am anti-male. I am not anti-marriage. Comrade Deng Yingchao is also a married woman. Your contribution to women is not as great as hers? , I didnâ€™t get divorced because it was more cost-effective to kill my husband than get divorced. Iâ€™m almost 50, so it doesnâ€™t matter if I buy insurance and wait a few years. The reason for being anti-male is that breakthrough results have been achieved in solitary male reproduction, there are sufficient funds, and female annihilation is just around the corner. I have to pave the way for my daughter. This is not a contradiction. Am I clear? ,Original Bo has blocked me, so I canâ€™t reply below. Feminism like Yuan Bo's idea that all married women should die is really funny. Married women account for more than half of all women in our country. If you kill all these married women as you wish, will you be able to live a happy life? You guys are so hateful towards women, you are really good thugs for male supremacy. translated_text: I have said it a thousand times. This metaphor is very lame. It was proposed by the user based on opposing concepts. A patriarchal society is not a relationship between slave owners and slaves. This includes the beginning of the original Weibo post, "Men and women are shaped by society." "As a result", there are places where it has been damaged. Does the slavery of slave owners still harm the slave owners? If you are full of good intentions and think it's okay, then it's okay. That's fine. , no one will ever worry about the elimination of men in the spirit of feminism. As for men in social status, it is better to eliminate them. Well, it comes back again. I used her metaphor to argue against the absurd results of logic to oppose her retarded metaphor. Now you use me to refute it. Does her stuff refute me? , and you still have problems with your reading comprehension. I donâ€™t know where your hostility comes from. Did I say that womenâ€™s rights must benefit everyone? What's more, when it's time to confront, it's not with gender, but with social systems and concepts. Nothing is impossible. The final result of gender equality and equal rights is that everyone benefits, and each gender does not need to be disciplined by society. , Iâ€™m convinced. Do you only have zero-sum games and no exponential growth in your brain? Take your favorite slave liberation movement as an example. Do you think slave liberation is purely for human rights? The destruction of American slavery was to liberate southern productivity. , relying on you to simply instigate confrontation, it is still ancient Greece in the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Period. , I donâ€™t know why you have to repeat a bunch of absolutely correct nonsense to me. No one here is thinking about what to do if there are no slaves after the emancipation of black people, and no one is thinking about what to do if men have no vested interests after gender equality. The problem is that this metaphor is always silly and implicitly antagonistic, men and women are not slave masters and slaves, and gender equality ultimately benefits no one. , I am a Buddha, did I say that men and women are already equal? Do you watch people arguing without looking at the context? Just read the original text on Weibo in vain? Why does the original text say "more mentions of women" instead of "only mentions women", and why does it say "women have more sense of dislocation"? This is a different answer to the same question in the original text. Feel for yourself, what does this have to do with a conflict of interest. , and this kind of metaphor full of errors is extremely stupid, not to mention that metaphorical rhetoric can be used in "because so" arguments? Since you think itâ€™s common, thatâ€™s ok, but I donâ€™t understand your jargonğŸ‘Œ. Well, women are all in a community of destiny, and we all understand each other with good intentions. It doesnâ€™t matter what men say. She even said, "Please go and care about those men who are persecuted by Nanquan society. I don't have time." There is no problem. Her metaphor is completely based on the psychology of gender opposition. You can understand it however you want. ,So, I donâ€™t know what we have to argue about. What you want to argue so far is all that I agree with. What I said is not in the context of you. It seems that I am not the one you want to refute. Letâ€™s stop here. Itâ€™s good to understand others with good intentions. Unfortunately, reading comprehension still needs to be improved. First, I donâ€™t think what you want. Second, I didnâ€™t emphasize that privilege has nothing to do with gender. Third, gender equality is not feminism, and equal rights does not equal womenâ€™s rights (although womenâ€™s rights are definitely equal rights). LGBT also have equal rights. among them, but also within gender politics.

translated_text: Wow, this is true. That time I saw a female doctor in her fifties looking for a partner on a post forum. Her requirements were the same as those of a male doctor who was in her fifties. She said that a male doctor in her fifties would look for a doctor in her twenties and would not ask a rotten person like you to comment for me. He said: A female doctor with a dick cancer can also find a young man in his twenties. He was chased and scolded by Tieba dogs for two days. Itâ€™s really no exaggeration.

I donâ€™t take any stand on the cuckold king thing, so just having children will take a lot of credit. When a woman gives birth to a child in a marriage, she is doing something for herself and the next generation, not just to be wronged or take credit for the man's birth. Women should bear the risk of giving birth. If they feel that they have made a contribution and are great, they should seek credit from their husband's family. Wouldn't it mean that they have reduced themselves to a fertility machine? When a man gets divorced, he first seizes the moral high ground and gets into trouble, which is very ungentlemanly.

Most men buy a house at the expense of their family, because the children born to men bear the family name and carry on the family lineage. If men and women buy a house together, the man will also work and the woman will work. Moreover, the woman was delayed in her work during the ten-month pregnancy and gave birth to the child, and her body was also damaged. It was natural for the child to have the woman's surname.

I feel that anti-patriarchy is at the core of anti-patriarchy, which is accomplished solely through the patriarchal marriage transaction. Because men cannot have children. Without patriarchy, there would be no preference for boys over girls, and there would be no workplace discrimination, maternity discrimination, etc. This is the root of the problem. As long as we return to the maternal line, everything will be solved. The pro-marriage faction has no energy to help women's rights at all. They are too busy just solving the problem of marriage and childbearing. , I think the moderates are actually the marriage-preserving faction. They believe that as long as the other person is good enough, they can get married and be cautious about marriage and childbirth. Therefore, they will actually support the concept of male-dominated marriage, which I think is the opposite of feminism. The extreme ones are against the patriarchal marriage system and even return to the matrilineal system. , I think you have misunderstood what I said. Moderation and extreme are not opposites, but under the instigation of male supremacy, some moderates have begun to follow the trend of black extremists, and it is these people who follow the trend that I want to scold. And not all mild. , as long as she curses the "moderate feminism" of extreme feminism, I will tell her to die. I do not support it.

But this kind of woman is also enviable. . , okay, I know women who are "born" like this. It mainly depends on gender awareness. After all, "women have no country." Maybe it's because men have been guided by the rules of the patriarchal game since they were young. They must exert their strength while listening to their father. and contribute to the clan. I feel that women are not as suitable for the "wolf nature" as men.
When a woman hits a man, she must be in a hurry. When a man hits a woman, even if the woman strikes first, he is still a scumbag

I know you want to say that 70 percent of homicide victims are men, but please look at other cases. Homicide is only a small part of the vicious crimes. , did you know that men will have 30 million more men than women in the future? Where did the missing 3,000 women go?
It's all their dream. Children are her tools to maintain marriage and provide for old age.

If my Weibo is exposed to some strange pain points because of a certain comment, I will say this first: when I started paying attention to niche groups, most of you hadnâ€™t started using Weibo yet. Please use your brain, boots. When I say that gay people cheating on marriages are real exes, I donâ€™t mean gay exes. If you donâ€™t cheat on marriages, you certainly donâ€™t meet the requirements for being scolded. If you think it's not good to use the word homosexual too directly, then I can only change it to someone who is not heterosexual.

That's right, that's right. Although I personally don't like the word "marriage donkey", Enhe's Weibo really just stated a fact and it was scolded on the trending search and called extreme feminism. I'm really saying that. I donâ€™t know how â€œgentleâ€ a woman has to be to be called a true feminist. Yes, that sister is now famous.

I found that no matter whether they are rich men or poor men, they cannot do without women, whether it is for sexual needs or the need to carry on the family line. Sometimes "having a woman" is exactly the motivation for their struggle. But women are different. Once a woman has the ability to be financially independent, she will completely throw away men! , where strength speaks for itself, women help each other and rely on strength to push men away. I really think men will sincerely help women.

Ke Jie really reminds me of the boy who was number one in his high school class. He would hit the wall and hit the floor if he failed in the exam. He would have a nervous breakdown at every turn. He would throw books and tear them up in class and cry. For those who talk nonsense, maybe this is the world of genius, and there is really nothing wrong with it. Some people really have no sense of scale. Anyway, you just canâ€™t take a joke, just press your head on pastoral feminism
The "free to flirt" society that Catherine Deneuve calls for is too idealistic, and the fact is that more women are being violated

translated_text: Many self-centered people want privileges in the name of feminism. As long as their selfishness is not satisfied, they will label you as discriminating and oppressing women. Men no longer enjoy the gender bonus and call women who demand normal human rights pastoral feminism
Feminism and pastoral feminism are two different things, just like straight men and straight men with cancer... The original poster is saying that pastoral feminism will only deepen the conflict.

I want to choose my own genes to have children, and let men and women fight for their child-rearing rights.
Oh, I feel bad. I am a grown man. If we really fight, how can I beat this shrew? If it werenâ€™t for love, character, and morality, would I be beaten by you, a shrew, in vain?

Who said that, bastard, clean up the garbage of male and female rights and let men and women love each other!

Men's boxing skills are becoming more and more magical. One moment, women's rights rely on selling their uteruses for sky-high betrothal gifts, and the next moment, anti-marriage and childbearing endanger the continuity of the nation. What do you think it is? Is this just following your words?

Men are always stigmatizing women. They always give them nicknames, such as "boxer" or "boxer". translated_text: What is slave life? Going forward and retreating together with your own family is called a slave? Taking your own children and calling them slaves? So your parents were also your slaves back then? I donâ€™t know if you have children. You can choose not to have them. When you reach a certain age and canâ€™t give birth, donâ€™t say that people use you as a reproductive tool. I donâ€™t care about your education or car or house. In exchange for someone who will always love you. Are you a bad person? If you marry a highly educated and wealthy person today, but he spends all day drinking and drinking, will that make you happy? As your queen said, women are not tools for reproduction, and women should not be solely responsible for housework and raising children. However, when my husband did not let me take care of the children and asked me to go shopping and let me play everywhere, I felt uneasy because I was worried about it. With my family, and if your eyes still work, you should see it. This original blogger is a male chauvinist, saying that we women canâ€™t do anything, and also demands a lot, saying that we only care about money, so I brought my affairs to him and told him not to look down on us women, but you are the only one Feminists came to criticize me, what do you mean by giving me a candy occasionally? I'm sorry, but he has been consistent for many years. Itâ€™s not that because you meet a scumbag, others will not be able to be happy. Itâ€™s not that your parents are bad. All parents are bad. I have a family and a husband who love me. what do you have? In addition to shouting in this virtual world, find a sense of existence. , I hate people who have different opinions from you, so there are so many people and things in this world that you still hate. Are you really so disdainful of people who have different opinions from you that you might as well die? Because there are so many people that you hate, and itâ€™s a pain for you to see us alive. Seeing as you follow a blogger named Queen Maya or something, you must have been brainwashed by her, and you are a feminist, and now The blogger I replied to is a male chauvinist, and you also follow him. You care about men's rights and women's rights. Are you afraid that it's because your marriage is too miserable that it leads to schizophrenia? , Iâ€™m really drunk. Men and women are equal. Men have difficulties as men, and women have difficulties as women. Why should you influence yourself because of other peopleâ€™s thoughts? If you think you can live well without women, stay away from women. If you feel you are a queen without men, stay away from men. Don't judge other people's lives as right or wrong, because you are not qualified. Donâ€™t be like a person who has been brainwashed by male-feminist ideas and pyramid schemes and hate others. It's your business to think you're unhappy. All you see is happiness in cars, houses, and academic qualifications! I didnâ€™t see the suffering he endured for me and my children, I didnâ€™t see the way he was anxious and in pain when I was sick, I didnâ€™t see the embarrassment of him, a grown man, choosing lipstick just to make me happy, I didnâ€™t see me I lost my temper with him, but he never had the heart to scold me. He never saw how angry he was when I was bullied... too many. You don't have to be like a resentful woman in the palace and worry about other people's happiness. There must be something hateful about poor people who point their fingers at others. Because my point of view is different from yours, the person who curses others as soon as he comes is the real idiot, or a resentful bitch and a shrew-level idiot. Are you and this blogger the opposite? Your opposition is your business, what you think a woman should be is your business, you cannot represent all women. If you don't love someone deeply, you have no right to comment on others' happiness. At least I have paid so much for this family, and it is worth it to get someone who loves me. translated_text: I'm sorry, I think I'm surviving well as a woman. It seems that rural female boxers all have unsatisfactory lives, so they collectively hate men and oppose marriage. Why don't you think that more people will feel that female police officers can't control people and commit crimes? Well, this inherent concept cannot be changed by womenâ€™s rights. Wake up, I'm sorry, I'm not a male. Don't you think if there were more female police officers, the crime rate would be higher? Male criminal empathy is also drunk, my family is a police officer, I'm sorry, I made you tired, You'd better go back to Tianyuan Women's Boxing. Please imagine a world where there are more female police officers than male police officers. You need to be practical and understand people's hearts. . . If the competition is fair, assuming that the number of female police officers and male police officers is equal, or even female police officers > male police officers, then. . . can not imagine. . I think. . This is just a biological injustice, not discrimination. . Just like why the sports meeting is divided into male and female groups, why not let boys and girls run together to achieve fair competition? Maybe 15% is just to give yourself a step down. Everyone likes to save face, let alone a school. Emmm, maybe the requirements for women are a bit higher. After all, women have higher body fat than men, and their frames are generally smaller. To be honest, physical work Worse than men (an aunt argued with me for a long time about this matter. Individual women cannot represent women as a whole, but she also said that the collective does not need to exist). If you want to be qualified, the standards are different. I donâ€™t think there is any difference. Discrimination, but some girls from the police academy are already criticizing women for their rights. . . , isnâ€™t it true that women are so idle that no one calls the police to the school? Will more people pass the police examination if it is opened to 100%? Donâ€™t be led away, last time Lang Lang got married, I had to talk about womenâ€™s rights, but I didnâ€™t see anything good on Weibo. If you insist on saying that hating men and opposing marriage is good, I can't help it. , what exactly did this feminist do? Is there some kind of anti-marriage policy or some kind of male-hating policy? I only said something about the bullying of girls on campus to inform teachers and parents, but I didnâ€™t even bother to post it on Weibo. Is this called womenâ€™s rights? If the police academy only recruits 15%, doesnâ€™t it mean that it cannot recruit enough talents? If you want to increase the ratio, just apply. . ,you mean. . . Is hating men and opposing marriage also shocking? emmmm, I may have some misunderstanding about shocking the world.

translated_text: Feminist bitch has the ability to use a large size, otherwise I will push your mother to the ground and rub her//
The man who earns ten times the salary is blindly attracted by rural women's rights, but the sad mad dog has been given up by the above two types of people. Even more sad.

People like you should be locked in a cage. When a man comes home from work, he pulls him out to vent and then puts him back in. Make a surrogate machine. A surrogate pregnancy of 20,000 yuan will give birth to more babies. If the baby is not a boy, throw it in the trash can and give birth again.

I also feel that feminism does not need to be perfect, and there is no need to bring bad luck to the so-called â€œreal feminismâ€. Feminism itself is a complex group, and that picture is indeed biased in its expression, but it is also true that when it comes to homosexuality in China, it is automatically assumed to be gay. I also think that womenâ€™s rights donâ€™t need to be so clean. Now there are fewer comments that humiliate women on the Internet. This is not because womenâ€™s rights are more reasonable. Itâ€™s really those sisters who scold their mothers for two hours and donâ€™t behave the same way, which scares the bad guys.

In fact, a pig has a litter of six or seven, so she is not as good as a pig. The piglets can regenerate when they grow up and can be eaten. The maggots she lays can only be used as garbage and cause harm to the world.

If you just donâ€™t understand the views of the feminist community, then go find the Weibo posts of feminist bloggers to understand and figure it out for yourself; if you recognize equal rights and say that womenâ€™s rights are privileges, then there is no need to discuss and do not reply. I hate the hypocrisy and brain-dead Madonna behavior of egalitarians, so you donâ€™t need to reply. If your tone of voice is not good, then you should participate less in discussions in the feminist area! Everyone in the Feminist Zone is entitled to express their own opinions, think about and define feminism, itâ€™s none of your business! ,The definition of feminism is constantly changing in ,practice. I donâ€™t know if you have studied history, but even middle school history tells us: a groupâ€™s struggle for rights means continuous practice, summarizing experience, and practicing again. A few years ago, I thought that womenâ€™s rights meant equal rights, but now I have discovered through practice that this is wrong. Now it is clearly stated that womenâ€™s rights do not hide the word â€˜womanâ€™. There have been many discussions in the feminist area. The more the truth is debated, the clearer it becomes and everyone agrees, and a new definition will naturally be formed. , the female group has been trampled under the feet of male power for thousands of years and has lost the most power. Now that women's rights are proposed to let the world know clearly that it is the rights demand of the female group, do you think women are fighting for privileges? What privileges are you fighting for? If women fighting for all the rights they should have by rights is called privileges, do you mean that women should have lower status and less rights than patriarchal men? Are egalitarian women not going to stand up and be a human being? Just want to beg for scraps under the patriarchy? , womenâ€™s rights are not equal rights. From the literal meaning of equal rights, everyone is equal. However, in practice, look at what equal rights have done. They have stood up for the legalization of surrogacy, found wives for poor men at the bottom, etc. These have seriously affected the rights and rights of women. Survival safety. The difference between women's rights and human rights is like the difference between the recent slogan BLM of black Americans and the slogan ALM of white people! Feminism is women's rights including all personal rights. Equality is menâ€™s rights.

I learned from you Chinese men, and the way to treat others is to treat their own bodies. Do you want to be the right one? Please find the culprit. Letâ€™s talk about when Chinese men will reflect on themselves, apologize and make amends. , now you know how to generalize? What about when you scold a female driver? When do you scold women? Why don't you know? Now I'm showing off a few, it's disgusting. , look, Chinese men are so virtuous, he canâ€™t see it when showing screenshots. Chinese men, haha, Chinese men are famous for pretending to be blind and have double standards.

Fourth, itâ€™s none of my business whether a man is happy or not. Do I still have to look at men when it comes to promoting womenâ€™s rights? Finally, I know everything you said, and I think she is fine.

translated_text: European and American men think that carrying a womanâ€™s bag is a sign of weakness.

But someone like him would only go home and scold his wife for "how to raise children." It is the fault of the housewife and mother if she does not teach her son. Anyway, it's not the fault of noble men like them who do great things.

Women's rights are the fundamental foundation of women's rights. Anti-marriage is the life model with the least loss for women, so anti-marriage is better than other models. But now China's marriage rate is 94%, and the road to anti-marriage must be taken step by step. It is really important to seize women's rights.

Nowadays, many women want to have status like Western women, but they donâ€™t want to struggle like them. They want to stay at home like Japanese women, but they donâ€™t want to be as virtuous as them.
Male boxers on Weibo can only spit shit. In reality, even if they scratch a little bit of skin, they feel distressed. Their bones are all soft. Why havenâ€™t the male boxers in our country kept up?
She's not even an egalitarian, she's at best a madam who likes to please men.
Nonsense, pregnancy and childbirth for ten months, how can you compare it with your worthless sperm? I advocate having two children, both with the mother's surname
In their eyes, girls are just entertainment.
There's no need to fight against the pastoral feminist bitch, these people's outlook on life is already rotten.
Agree. We must strive to compete with men. What is the difference between those so-called "feminists" who ridicule and insult women and the old wives in the old society?

translated_text: If same-sex marriage is legal, what if you still can't find a suitable person of the same sex after you come out, or you still can't get married? Wouldn't your parents commit suicide just like that? So if "children don't get married, parents commit suicide" is true, it will really help the world reduce aging. - The question is, why do you firmly believe that you can find someone of the same sex who is willing to marry you? Do you take your vows seriously? Do you think your fantasies are real life? What is the concept of "forced marriage"? Does it mean that they will be shot if they don't get married? If they just say that their parents will be disappointed if they donâ€™t get married, then their parents will probably be disappointed if they donâ€™t get admitted to Tsinghua University and Peking University. Did they get admitted? Their parents canâ€™t even ask them to stop using their mobile phones and staying up late. At this time, they can My parents came out as a shield. Adults insist that they are the victims, pretending to be pigs and eating tigers. , it is impossible to prove that "it can be reduced a lot" because China is very tolerant of gays and two people can live together without any interference. If you don't want children, a marriage certificate is not necessary. So I feel like this is just "making excuses". , Gay marriage is legal, but you canâ€™t have children within the marriage, right? Therefore, even if it is legal, it is nothing more than finding ways to adopt or surrogate, which will still harm women. This is the fundamental problem.

translated_text: After reading other peopleâ€™s comments like this, I understand. Prostitution for free is not prostitution. Not only did you not accept the money, but you also cheated on me. No wonder you tried to act like a dick in front of outsiders but ended up not being able to pay a penny. You really are so small-minded. I'm afraid the whole world won't know, did I talk about a married woman? I'm talking about donkey from beginning to end, oh no, you don't think it sounds good, then what about the Marriage Princess? If I don't give you an Alipay account, I'm a black account? If only you had as much money as your associative ability. This kind of thirsty single girl is in the same camp as you. Don't throw it at us. It's so pitiful. I forgot what I said yesterday. I was looking for excuses to save face for myself. Sure enough, there were only 2.50 left of the 2.5 million. Then I remind you again that your little brain has insufficient space to recall the message. It was you who said you used my words and you wanted to type me. It just comes out like a fart. Then what you said is even more serious. Doesn't this sound like fart? Look through your own speech records. translated_text: Right. But in the process of fighting for rights, there are some morbid psychology that pick out women's disadvantages and even go too far. This is extreme feminism. Insulting women at home and proudly posting it on the Internet is a kind of extreme patriarchy. Both are the reasons for deepening conflicts between opposite sexes. Then can you understand that feminism itself is extreme, so it can never be removed from the word extreme, and women's right to free speech has never been deprived. . If you talk nonsense, you will be labeled as extreme feminism, and feminism will also put men on the hat of patriarchy. Is there any imbalance? I think what you call talking nonsense is extreme. You think it is talking nonsense, I think it is brain-dead. This is the difference between men and women. Don't understand? Men surfing the Internet, can't talk nonsense? Saying ha is all patriarchy? Men hurt more people, men are more cruel, and then what answer do you want? The question is who said what men do is not extreme? I am explaining the problem to you, and you are arguing with me? Killing ten people is a death sentence, killing a hundred people is also a death sentence, is there any difference? Aren't they all beasts? Didn't I criticize? When I encounter people attacking girls in the game, I also speak up for them. The problem is that you are asking what extreme feminism is. Let me explain it to you. You didn't ask me what extreme patriarchy is. Do men harm men more or do women harm women more? Why do you always put women as victims instead of perpetrators? Why do you compare what women say with what men do instead of what women say with what men say? Is it because women are weaker than men? Or is it because women have no confidence? I have already given examples of equality between men and women. If you regard the ridiculous rights that extreme feminism is pursuing with their lives as a kind of empty talk, then you are actually more extreme than extreme feminism. Is there not enough such thing as Johnny Depp being abused by his wife? If you ask me to give you examples of things that women do that are more excessive than men, is there not enough? Do I need examples? Then what you mean is that whatever women say on the Internet is worthy of forgiveness because they did not do it, because they are kinder than the rape and murderers in prison. When you put law-abiding citizens and criminals in the same class for discussion, your logic is already confused.

Isnâ€™t it funny? In this way, some men have to have high status and some have low status? , if you insist on saying that these loopholes in Chinese laws or law enforcement are to benefit men or threaten womenâ€™s rights. In the same situation, if a man is harassed and calls the police, will anyone care? Are domestic violence cases in which a woman beats a man to death or a cold-blooded man is sentenced? Are these cases the result of the law tacitly accepting women as inferior to men, or are they simply legal loopholes? translated_text: I think many people who call women's rights or equal rights actually do so to please men. They may think that they can get more support or something like that. Itâ€™s better to respect your inner natural misogyny, just like menâ€™s misogyny. The only thing more opposite than equal rights is fascist feminism. Support it.
Sometimes I feel deeply that men have become a drag on women to some extent. Women could be more wonderful, whether physically or emotionally.

Do you think if things continue like this, will there be no women willing to give birth to our children? The descendants of the Yan and Huang people are about to become extinct. Who will take care of these extreme feminists? They are so brainwashed. They are angry... cold... shaking... indeed, very extreme. The most extreme in the world. It is really hateful.

Why are you ignoring it? There are a lot of reasons for us to go up and scold us. After all, we donâ€™t want to get any free benefits from men. We just donâ€™t want to let the patriarchy take advantage of them and still scold them as stupid people... What an elegant lady, how far is it? Go away as far as you can, just scold each one.

I want to say that men donâ€™t know how painful it is for women to give birth, and women donâ€™t know how tiring it is to buy a house or a car. In fact, the division of labor in society is different. If women understand more how hard it is for men to make money, and if men understand more how difficult it is for women to raise children, the world will be better. Much better

I also found that men especially give people wrong nicknames. Men of my fatherâ€™s generation basically all have wrong nicknames, and many of my junior high school classmates have wrong nicknames. Anyway, girls are far inferior in this aspect. In our dialect, we call her Madiaopo. It means a woman who chirps like a sparrow. In fact, there are indeed such women, but there are also many men. They just don't appear in this chirping form, and are more of a boastful type who don't know how to pretend to understand.

Since Western countries are developed countries, do they not have "dross"? Take the United States as an example: More than half of the states in the United States do not set a legal lower limit for marriage. Even in less than half of the states that have set a lower limit, many have a lower limit of 13 or 14 years old. According to incomplete statistics from the American "anti-child marriage" organization, there were 167,000 child marriages in the 38 states surveyed from 2000 to 2010 alone, 87% of which were girls. What do you feminists say about these data?
Woody Allen is probably a pedophile too. Either that or he has a perverted personality. No matter how you look at it, it is a bit abnormal for someone to marry his adopted daughter.

It is said that Lawyer Wuâ€™s case made everyone oppose marriage. However, Lawyer Wu made women compete with men in marriage and led female fans to hate full-time housewives. Isnâ€™t this cheating women? I have no objection to criticizing women who want to get married, but turning their backs on men and praising men. Isnâ€™t this really a subtle point? Why are women all anti-marriage and everything will be settled? Just dream. , after a woman gets married, because the patriarchal culture has always restricted women to the home, it does affect the competition in the workplace, but this matter should not be resentful to women in marriage. In the final analysis, it is still a matter of male dominance, and childbirth is also caused by menâ€™s unwillingness to share parental leave. affects work, so why are they targeting women? Marriage is still mainstream now. I am obsessed with married women, but I am fascinated by the fact that women who directly hate married women favor male lawyers and male idols.
This woman solicits sympathy, bullies others, and distorts facts. I think she has a perverted and murderous tendency in her heart. Her personality is split and twisted.
Men's rights and women's rights are all for themselves, but don't think of yourself as if you are for all mankind.
Before the rapist could say anything, he started to defend others. Could it be that he was the rapist himself?

translated_text: When you said married women, you didn't add a prefix. You just cursed it, and then you said that Gangding is a donkey, and your mother is not. I said I didn't have any leverage, and your accomplice said, "You don't have it, so why are you so anxious?" Tsk tsk In the same situation, you guys are empathic, and I'm just right, right? I really hope that you single women can unite the front first, and stop you from shouting about being unmarried and infertile, and looking down on men. Your single female compatriots can't help but pounce on the million-dollar Range Rover. When they see Wang Sicong and Qin Fen, they want to steal a man's sperm to get pregnant and force marriage. You said that we are all married to your single women to maintain stability, why do you always have traitors in your single women camp? , I said it would cost 5 million to raise my daughter. Am I just like you, sitting there waiting to die without making any money for 20 years? , I didnâ€™t make excuses, I never said I wanted Weibo red envelopes for you, have you brainwashed yourself to no end? Your father gave birth to you to continue the family line, and your mother gave birth to you to cater to male dominance. Anyway, your family members are all merciless tools for you, so by the way, I wish your parents will die soon and you will be infertile for the rest of your life. Isnâ€™t that very satisfying?

translated_text: The last point to add (I am a man), 3. Freedom is valuable in real life, but there is no absolute freedom. Just like a bird is very free, but it cannot cross the sky. So freedom is relative, and there are some objective factors that need to be accepted. Just like you said, what should you do if you can't stand the parents of a boy? I wonâ€™t go into details about the second article. If you love him/her very much, shouldnâ€™t you compromise just because of objective conditions? Is this what your heart really wants? , 2. Love requires commitment. If it cannot give the other party a sense of security, then this love is not solid and cannot be counted as true love. First of all, you need to conduct an objective and rational analysis to analyze whether you love each other and whether he/she is worthy of your love. If so, then think about whether there are any specific solutions. If you are helpless, you can still walk away with your partner. However, the blogger has a sentence that I disagree with, that is, "Parents who don't like their boyfriend or husband can break up and get a divorce." Why do I disagree? The reasons are as follows: 1. The woman can Becoming a partner with a man means that you at least love each other (if nothing else, you support breaking up). If you break up just because of the other person's parents, does that mean compromising to the world? , this is the original concept of consciousness of people, that is, family education. If the initial concept is wrong, then the people's thoughts may solidify when they grow up. At this time, even if Confucius is reincarnated, there will be nothing he can do. But do we dare to say that our ideas are definitely correct? What we have to do is not to spread ideas, but to lead them/them to be good, because the root of sexism is not gender, but discrimination. Just like Michelangelo and Raphael, one advocates the beauty of sublime power, and the other believes in elegance. With their soft beauty, itâ€™s hard to tell which one of them is right and which is wrong. In fact, the reason why there is "sexism" is not just a matter of gender. I wonder if you have noticed that a sexist person not only discriminates against gender, he must also have other forms of discrimination. Therefore, treatment must "Treat the root cause." , All unique personalities mean strength. In fact, the real horror of sexism is that the victims also choose to accept it invisibly, which leads to the formation of a mindset, as if we must be like this, and that is wrong. . Life itself is diverse, just like a painter painting. With the same model and the same scene, the feelings of the paintings painted by two top painters are completely different.
